description: This file contains CSS styles for a web application, specifically defining theme variables and styling for various components of the application such as headers, buttons, and animations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and dynamic background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styling for the application header, including layout and background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes, styled with position, colors, and transitions.
